meanings.definition: Showing an interest in or appreciation for art.
meanings.sent1: She has an arty room filled with paintings and sculptures.
meanings.sent2: The gallery featured many arty pieces by local artists.
meanings.sent3: His arty outfit made him stand out at the art show.
meanings.sent4: Her arty style was like a colorful canvas come to life.
meanings.sent5: The arty decorations transformed the space into a creative haven.

meanings.definition: Characteristic of a person who is involved in or interested in the arts.
meanings.sent1: The arty student always had a sketchbook with them.
meanings.sent2: She had an arty demeanor that drew others to her.
meanings.sent3: His arty personality shone through in his love for theater.
meanings.sent4: The arty atmosphere of the studio inspired creativity.
meanings.sent5: Their arty conversations were filled with passion for artistic expression.

meanings.definition: Displaying creativity or originality in a way that is considered pretentious or affected.
meanings.sent1: Her arty mannerisms sometimes came across as insincere.
meanings.sent2: The film was criticized for its arty and self-indulgent style.
meanings.sent3: His arty behavior at the party seemed over-the-top.
meanings.sent4: The arty presentation failed to connect with the audience.
meanings.sent5: The arty performance was met with mixed reviews for its avant-garde approach.
